verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will listen for Your Voice
I will call upon Your Name
For there's only now one choice
And that's to follow the Lamb
Chorus:
Follow the Lamb (2x)
There's only now one choice
And that's to follow the Lamb (Repeat)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
A tu Voz yo voy a oir
A tu nombre clamare
Una cosa debo hacer:
Al Cordero seguir.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Coro:
A El seguir (2x)
Una cosa debo hacer
